message.body: Hey friend! Long time no talk, hope all is well! Can you send me your mailing address?
Perfect, thank you! And yes definitely, a catchup is in order! I won't be home for thanksgiving, but phone chat soon? I could do tomorrow or Monday, or the week after...
Yeah maybe we can chat tomorrow
Okay cool! I'll just be running errands most of the day so if you're free just give me a call :)
